Title: Daniel Roth Mens Automatic Chronograph Watch 247.X.10.041.CN.BD
Description: Watches Jewelry Accessories About us Policies Daniel Roth Mens Automatic Chronograph Watch 247.X.10.041.CN.BD (Click to Enlarge) Daniel Roth Mens Automatic Chronograph Watch 247.X.10.041.CN.BD Condition: Certified Pre-Owned Brand: Certified Pre-Owned Reference: 247.X.10.041.CN.BD Also Known As: 247X10041CNBD Web ID: 166820Stock Number: 2188913Case Size: 41.50 x 38.50 mm Gender: Gents Movement: Automatic Caliber: DR500 Bezel: 18K Yellow Gold Functions: Hours, Minutes, Small seconds, Chronograph, Date Strap: Leather Clasp Type: Deployment Included Items: Gift Box Power Reserve: 50 Hours Materials: 18K Yellow Gold Finishing: 18K Yellow Gold Case Back: Transparent (See-Through) Dial Color: Champagne Compelling vintage aesthetics are mixed with contemporary excellence in this fantastic timepiece from Daniel Roth which offers an elaborate chronograph function in a well-arranged and highly legible manner. The copper guilloché dial with Roman numerals and slight luminescent emphasis displays hours, minutes and chronograph seconds via central blued hands and shows small seconds at nine o'clock and date between four and five o'clock while 30-minute and 12-hour counters are located at three and six o'clock positions respectively. Beneath lies the self-winding DR500 caliber with 31 jewels and 50-hour power reserve, visible through the transparent back of the 18K yellow gold which is fitted with an anti-reflective scratch-resistant sapphire crystal and mounted onto a brown leather strap secured on the wrist with a folding clasp.Please note that some watches are on memo from other dealers and do not carry a return policy, you will be notified before your purchase if the selected watch meets this criteria.
